name: config
description: (AppBuilder) This service is responsible for managing the configuration volume and initializing it's contents
author: Johnny Hausman

scripts.lint: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo 'âœ”  Your .js files look good.'
scripts.devBuild:win32: docker run -it --mount type=bind,source=%cd%,target=/app -w /app node npm install
scripts.devBuild:darwin:linux: docker run -it --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)",target=/app -w /app node npm install
